item.title: BIG LOTS INC 10-K
item.description: BIG LOTS INC, which is in the Retail-Variety Stores [5331] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 30, 2021 had 25271 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2020 - 291 instances million - 220 instances 1 - 211 instances financial - 201 instances 2019 - 169 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
